name: Super Street Waver III
description:
In Super Street Waver, your goal is to create the longest, coolest handshake possible!

Player 1 uses WASD, Player 2 uses the Arrow Keys. Match the handshake shown in the bottom center of the screen. Successful handshakes in a row increases your score!

Designed for the Global Game Jam 2017.

Design - Carl Farra

Code - Nick Domenicali

Art - Pat Skelton

"Awkward" and "Dude" Sounds - Noah Schnoll

Music - Guile's Theme (Street Fighter)
